DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare subjective performance two daily disposable contact lenses respect comfort handling .
DOC.brief_title: Multi-Center Clinical Evaluation Two Daily Disposable Contact Lenses ( Study 2 )
DOC.criteria: Adapted soft contact lens wearer ; Spherical distance contact lens prescription 1.00 6.00 diopter ( inclusive ) ; Spectacle cylinder ≤0.75 diopter least astigmatic eye , ≤1.00 diopter ; Correctable 6/9 ( 20/30 ) eye ; Read , understand , sign informed consent ; Willing comply wear schedule ; Willing comply study visit schedule ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Any active corneal infection , injury inflammation ; Systemic ocular allergy might interfere contact lens wear ; Systemic ocular disease might interfere contact lens wear ; Strabismus amblyopia ; Corneal refractive surgery anterior segment surgery ; Use systemic/topical medication contraindicate contact lens wear ; Use gas permeable contact lens within 1 month precede study ; Participation concurrent clinical trial last 30 day ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
